#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t=1,n,a[55],mid,sum=0;

for( ; ; )
{
cin>>n;
if(n==0)
    break;
int m=0;

cin>>a[0];
sum=a[0];
for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
{
cin>>a[i];
sum=sum+a[i];

}
mid=sum/n;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
if(a[i]<mid)
{
m=m+(mid-a[i]);
}
}
cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl;
cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<m<<"."<<endl<<endl;
t++;
}
return 0;}
